missing_requirements.reason: The new resetData method explicitly reads `caller` and performs an AccessControl permission check, trapping if not admin, which violates the requirement of no caller/authorization checks.

missing_requirements.requirement: Reset must wipe all persisted application data (chatrooms, messages, reactions, active user tracking, user profiles) and reset ID counters (nextChatroomId/nextMessageId or equivalent).
missing_requirements.reason: In the visible (truncated) portion of resetData, only `nextMessageId := 0;` is shown; there is no visible evidence of resetting `nextChatroomId` or clearing chatrooms/messages/reactions/activeUsers/userProfiles maps/collections.
